description: Episode of Series "Discovery and Experience". As there is growing emphasis in education on what a child does rather than what the teacher says, a gradual change in teaching methods and class management has taken place. Discusses new concepts in teaching, teacher training, classroom organisation and the attitude of the teacher to the children. Suitable for teacher training.
